hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Los Angeles - Rosemead
general_description: DoubleTree by Hilton Los Angeles - Rosemead features an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Dining options at the hotel include a restaurant and a coffee shop/café. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Wireless Internet access is complimentary.   Business amenities at this 3-star property consist of a business center, limo/town car service, and a meeting room. This business-friendly hotel also offers multilingual staff, gift shops/newsstands, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Complimentary self parking is available on site.

general_description: Amenities include meeting space for up to 65 people and a round-the-clock business center with 2 computer workstations and printer access. Guests can enjoy a wide array of in-room spa services through a local spa partner. Concierge services and tours of Los Angeles area attractions are available. The hotel offers room service (limited hours), dry cleaning services, and complimentary local newspapers in the lobby. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available in public areas.Guests can enjoy handcrafted cocktails, light snacks, and panoramic views of the sandy beach and surrounding communities from HIGH, the hotel's rooftop open-air lounge. A full breakfast is served daily in the Barlo Kitchen + Cocktails restaurant for a surcharge.

dining: HIGH Rooftop Lounge - HIGH takes full advantage of its outdoor rooftop location and delivers breathtaking, nearly 360-degree views of the city, from famed Muscle Beach and the Boardwalk below to the Hollywood Sign and Downtown L.A. With an inviting, "no velvet ropes" attitude and a comfortable, contemporary design, tourists and locals alike mingle and enjoy a drink menu of premium handcrafted cocktails, artisan beers, interesting wines, and light snacks. Barlo Kitchen + Cocktails - Barlo, a Venice Beach eatery and hangout, serves up breakfast, brunch, and dinner menus of ever-rotating "barn-to-belly" dishes and innovative drinks. With a focus on simplicity and inspiration from fresh farmers' market ingredients, Barlo delivers vibrant flavors and a strong communal ambiance reflecting its Venice Beach locale.

hotel_name: Crowne Plaza Los Angeles - International Airport
general_description: The Crowne Plaza Los Angeles - International Airport is less than 1 mile (1.6 kilometers) from the Los Angeles International Airport and 5 miles (8.1 kilometers) from Venice Beach and Manhattan Beach. Shopping and a full-service spa are nearby. Airport transportation is complimentary 24 hours a day, and an area shuttle is also available for an extra fee.The property includes an outdoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center. The 24-hour business center offers copying, printing, and computer use. The hotel's 20 conference rooms provide 14,000 square feet (1,260 square meters) of meeting space. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available, and luggage storage is provided.Dining options at this convenient accommodation include the Century Taproom, the Landings restaurant providing Californian-inspired cuisine, quick meal options at the Boulevard Market Cafe, and fresh seafood at the Yokoso Sushi Bar. Room service is also available 24 hours a day.Crowne Plaza Los Angeles - International Airport is a smoke-free property.

hotel_name: Best Western Plus Gateway Hotel Santa Monica
general_description: This Best Western is on the east side of Santa Monica, a half mile from the Santa Monica Expo Line, and about 2 miles from both the Santa Monica Convention Center, and the Third Street Promenade's array of shops, restaurants, and entertainment.The Santa Monica Beach and Pier are 2 miles away.  Venice Beach is 3 miles from the hotel.  The hotel's location provides easy access to California's Pacific Coast Highway.Underground self-parking is complimentary (one car per room; surcharge for additional vehicles).

general_description: The Mayfair Hotel Los Angeles, built in 1926, is one of the most historic hotels in the area and perfect for anyone visiting Los Angeles on a budget. The European-style lobby features marble floors, fluted pillars, and glass skylights. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk staff, fitness center, business center, valet parking (surcharge), concierge services, and complimentary wireless Internet access throughout the hotel.Its prime location is close to a number of attractions, including Los Angeles Convention Center, Staples Center, LA Live, Union Station, China Town, Little Tokyo, and other iconic cultural attractions such as The Broad Museum, Disney Concert Hall, Microsoft Theatre, USC,  Grammy Museum, and Orpheum Theatre.

general_description: Located 5 miles (8 kilometers) from Universal Studios Hollywood and 14.25 miles (23 kilometers) from downtown LA, the Los Angeles Marriott Burbank Airport features a self-contained convention center with 22 conference rooms totaling 50,000 square feet (4,645 square meters) of meeting space, plus 2 outdoor swimming pools, a cabana,  fire pits, a Starbucks, The Daily Grill restaurant, a 24-hour work-out gym, a business center, and a complimentary shuttle to Burbank-Glendale-Pasadena Airport. WiFi is available for a surcharge. A complimentary scheduled shuttle to and from Universal Studios is based on availability. A complimentary roundtrip airport shuttle is also available.

general_description: This smoke-free Culver City hotel is three miles from Los Angeles International Airport, five miles from Marina del Rey and three miles from the legendary Sony Pictures Studio which offers tours Monday through Friday. Business-related amenities at this 4-star property consist of a technology help desk, limo/town car service, and audiovisual equipment. The Crescent - Beverly Hills is a smoke-free property.

general_description: Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City occupies 6 hillside acres, a block from Universal Studios and 5 miles (8 km) from Hollywood. Complimentary scheduled trams offer transportation to Universal Studios and a nearby Metro station. The hotel is located 6 miles (9.6 km) from Burbank Bob Hope Airport.The high-rise hotel's lobby features vaulted ceilings, crystal chandeliers, and a light-filled restaurant and lounge. WiFi is available in all public areas and throughout the rooms for a fee. The outdoor splash pool and spa tub have Hollywood Hills views, and a fitness room provides cardio and strength-training equipment as well as free weights. Meeting and event space includes a ballroom for 1,500 guests. A 24-hour business center provides printing, faxing, copying, and high-speed Internet access (surcharges).Secure self parking and valet parking (surcharges) are available on site.

hotel_name: Embassy Suites Los Angeles Intl Airport North
general_description: This Embassy Suites provides 24-hour shuttle service to Los Angeles International Airport, less than a mile (1.6 kilometers) away. An independently operated shuttle offers shuttle service to and from Manhattan Beach, 5.5 miles (8.9 kilometers) away (surcharge). Many Los Angeles attractions are within 12 to 15 miles (19 to 24 kilometers) of this LAX Airport hotel.    A soaring tropical atrium is the setting for a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast and evening reception with complimentary cocktails and snacks.   Wireless Internet access is available in the atrium. The Embassy Suites Los Angeles Intl Airport North also offers a 24-hour business center, a heated outdoor pool, a 24-hour fitness center, and a spa. Garage parking and extended parking are available for a surcharge.

general_description: Two blocks from the Ventura Freeway (US-101), this upscale Marriott hotel is in a corporate complex across from the Promenade Mall and one mile from the giant Topanga Plaza Shopping Center. The indoor pool offers a view of the outdoor pool with its walls of windows. The outdoor pool area includes lush foliage, terrace furnishings, intimate cabanas, firepit and bar. The fitness center has floor-to-ceiling windows, cutting-edge equipment, and personal monitors.   Dining-and-refreshment options include Breeze: An American Grill, the Q Martini Bar, and Starbucks. A 24-hour business center contains a printer, copier, executive swivel chairs, and computers with complimentary high-speed Internet access. This Los Angeles hotel has 25,000 square feet of meeting and banquet space, a garden gazebo, and a poolside pavilion.

dining: Breeze: An American Grill - Light-filled restaurant with arched atrium ceiling and curved wall of windows. American cuisine with accent on fresh California flavors. Charbroiled T-Bone Steak, Grilled Salmon Mignonette, Pan-Roasted Halibut among menu highlights. Desserts such as Xangos Chocolate Marble Cheesecake, Warm Apple Cobbler with Ice Cream. Breakfast, lunch, dinner daily; Sunday brunch. Outdoor dining in summer. Q Martini Bar - Hammered-copper bar, green-leather sofas and armchairs in front area. Adjacent area with two big-screen TVs, pyramid-shaped lighting, hardwood floor, black-and-white photos of Hollywood celebrities. Appetizers, Breeze menu, wines by the glass, draft beers, fruit-infused vodkas, and specialty cocktails, including signature martinis. Starbucks - Coffee, espresso, snacks, pastries. Open early morning until late evening. Located just off lobby. Urban Oasis Poolside Bar - Open during the summer.
nearby: The year-round heated outdoor pool includes a sundeck and a summer poolside bar. Facing the outdoor pool, the indoor pool features an atrium ceiling, three walls of windows, and adjoining spa tub. The fitness room includes cardio and resistance machines, free weights, TVs, and women's and men's locker rooms with saunas. Warner Park, adjacent to this Marriott hotel, has a running path, picnic tables, a playground, shade trees, and lots of space to stretch out in the sunshine. Five miles away, Topanga State Park provides panoramic Pacific Ocean views, 36 miles of trails, and bird-watching opportunities. Simi Hills Golf Course is 14 miles northwest of the hotel. The top-ranked Lost Canyons Golf Club, designed by Pete Dye and offering 36 holes, is 16 miles away. Griffith Park is about 16 miles east. The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or near the hotel in the Los Angeles area; fees may apply. Golfing nearby Bicycle rentals nearby Mountain biking nearby Hiking/biking trails nearby Scooter/moped rentals nearby

hotel_name: Omni Los Angeles Hotel at California Plaza
general_description: The conveniently located Omni is half a mile from Chinatown, within two miles of the Los Angeles Convention Center, and three miles from Staples Center. The hotel provides complimentary Town Car service within three miles upon request (subject to availability; transportation to Staples Center and the Los Angeles Convention Center excluded). Grand Café offers terrace dining for breakfast and lunch, and Noé Restaurant specializes in progressive American cuisine for dinner nightly. Adjacent to the restaurant, Noé Bar features signature martinis and a humidor with a selection of cigars. WiFi access (surcharge) is available on the hotel's third level and above. A 24-hour business center provides high-speed Internet access, printing, faxing, and other services; fees apply.The hotel's fourth floor houses an outdoor lap pool and adjacent fitness center. Guests can also enjoy spa services such as massage, facial treatments, and body wraps.The Omni's 20,000 square feet of meeting and event space includes a ballroom for 850 guests.The complimentary Omni Kids program provides child-friendly amenities such as suitcases filled with books and games and goodie bags upon check-in. The property accommodates guests with disabilities.

general_description: In addition to an outdoor pool, Best Western Golden Sails Hotel provides a spa tub and a 24-hour fitness center. The hotel offers a restaurant. A bar/lounge is on site where guests can unwind with a drink. Guests can enjoy a complimentary breakfast. A computer station is located on site and wireless Internet access is complimentary.   This hotel offers access to a business center and meeting rooms. Event facilities measuring 14004 square feet (1301 square meters) include conference space. This business-friendly hotel also offers multilingual staff, a garden, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. A shuttle from the hotel to the airport is complimentary to guests during limited hours. Onsite self parking is complimentary.   Best Western Golden Sails Hotel is a smoke-free property.

general_description: Ramada Inn Burbank Airport offers a convenient location off I-5, less than 2 miles from the airport, and within 5 miles of NBC, Warner Brothers, and Disney Studios®.  This property offers concierge services as well as a complimentary airport shuttle service to the Burbank airport between 6:30 AM and 10:30 PM daily. A lobby computer offers complimentary high-speed Internet access. a 24-hour business center is onsite. Fax and copy services are available (surcharge). No pets are allowed except for service animals. Bus parking is provided with limited availability. Disabled-accessible facilities and guestrooms are available.

general_description: Newly renovated in March 2016, the Avalon Hotel Beverly Hills is composed of three buildings, and features a unique outdoor pool with dining cabanas. Other amenities include a fitness center, in-room spa treatments, a popular restaurant and bar, and 400-square-feet of flexible meeting space with high-speed Internet access (surcharge). One of the three buildings is assigned to the guests with pets. Guestrooms are all nonsmoking.

general_description: Offering easy freeway access, this recently renovated hotel and meeting center is in a business and financial district, five miles from Burbank, six miles from Pasadena, and 10 miles from downtown Los Angeles. Major corporations, such as Nestlé USA, Disney, and Cigna, occupy neighboring high-rises. The giant Glendale Galleria, with 250 stores, is one mile away.Dining options include Amuse, a light-filled restaurant and coffee bar facing the outdoor pool. WiFi is free in public areas, rooms, and the Executive Meeting Center. The outdoor lap pool, open year-round, includes a large sundeck with poolside drink service. In addition to the 6,130-square-foot Executive Meeting Center, the hotel offers 13,000 square feet of flexible event space. There are 25 conference rooms.

nearby: The hotel's outdoor lap pool is surrounded by a sundeck with lounge chairs and drink service. The fitness center has floor-to-ceiling windows, cardio and resistance machines, a sauna, two TVs, and locker rooms. Griffith Park, three miles away, is a vast urban oasis with jogging paths, golf courses, tennis courts, an outdoor pool, playgrounds, and a 53-mile network of hiking trails. The park is also home to the Los Angeles Zoo, the Museum of the American West, the historic outdoor Greek Theatre, a 1926 merry-go-round, the Griffith Observatory, and a bird sanctuary. The 18-hole Scholl Canyon Golf Club, a public course, is five miles from the hotel. The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or near the hotel; fees may apply. general_description: The Grafton on Sunset is within 3 blocks of some of the city's best-known clubs. Sunset Plaza, with cafés, salons, and designer boutiques, is 3 blocks from the hotel. The upscale Beverly Center mall is 1 mile (1.6 kilometers) away.Complimentary WiFi offered in public spaces as well as in guestrooms. The business center, open 24 hours, offers complimentary use of PC and Macintosh computer terminals for Internet access, word processing, and printing. The Grafton On Sunset's lounge, Bar 20, one of the hottest lounges on the Sunset Strip. Guestrooms feature a contemporary combination of leather, metal, and red accents for an industrial chic stay.

general_description: Fairfield Inn & Suites Los Angeles LAX/El Segundo is one mile south of Los Angeles International Airport in El Segundo. This smoke-free hotel offers complimentary roundtrip airport transportation 24 hours a day. A metro station is also located nearby.Fairfield Inn & Suites Los Angeles offers 1,700 square feet of meeting space. A computer kiosk in the lobby provides high-speed Internet access. Wireless Internet access is complimentary throughout the property. Guest overnight parking is available for a fee.

general_description: In addition to an outdoor pool, Sheraton Universal Hotel provides a spa tub and a fitness center. The hotel offers a restaurant and a coffee shop/café. Sheraton Universal Hotel is a smoke-free property.

general_description: Adjacent to the world's largest man-made yacht marina, The Inn at Venice Beach is located within two blocks of Venice Beach and the Boardwalk. Services offered at this smoke-free hotel include fax, photocopying, and dry cleaning. The front desk is attended 24 hours a day, and wireless Internet access is complimentary throughout the hotel. A complimentary continental breakfast is served each morning at the Cobblestone Café and Courtyard. Guests can rent bikes from the inn to explore nearby areas.

nearby: The Inn at Venice Beach is located just one block from the famous pier and beach, a great place to enjoy surfing and boogey boarding, renting a boat or jet ski, or fishing off the Venice Fishing Pier (no license required). The town's Snook Haven County Park offers boat, canoe, and kayak rentals to take you out on the water. Kids of all ages enjoy frolicking among the wet jets of Children's Fountain in Centennial Park. For those who want to enjoy the water scene without getting wet, there is strolling, biking and roller blading along the beach boardwalk, canals and Venetian Waterway Trail, which runs along both sides of the Intracoastal Waterway for a peaceful view of boats and dolphins making their way through the channel. Well known for its artists, street performers and funky atmosphere, Venice Beach is a virtual carnival running year round with free admission. general_description: Less than a mile from LAX airport and 10 miles (16.1 kilometers) from downtown L.A., La Quinta Inn & Suites LAX is a convenient hub. Beaches are nearby, with Venice Beach's colorful boardwalk less than 7 miles (11.3 kilometers) away and the Santa Monica pier less than 9 miles (14.5 kilometers) away. The upscale shopping and mansions of Beverly Hills - including Rodeo Drive - are just over 8 miles (12.9 kilometers) away.The onsite restaurant serves American cuisine and is open from late morning to late evening. For recreation, there's a heated outdoor pool and sundeck, plus a fitness facility.The hotel hosts banquets, receptions, and business gatherings in its 7,900 square feet (734 square meters) of meeting space, with theater seating for up to 320 and a business center available to guests. Parking is also available on site (surcharge).Accessible facilities and guestrooms are available.

hotel_name: Kimpton Hotel Palomar Los Angeles Beverly Hills
general_description: Hotel Palomar Los Angeles-Westwood is situated on Wilshire Boulevard, just 4 blocks from Westwood Village. UCLA is within 6 blocks, Beverly Hills is 2.5 miles away, and downtown Los Angeles is within 16 miles.   The entire property has been completely renovated as of March, 2017. In-room spa services include massage, facials, and hand and foot treatments (surcharge). Complimentary yoga accessories are provided to complement the full array of health and fitness channels available on guestroom TVs. A 24-hour fitness center with state-of-the-art equipment is available 24 hours a day, as are a business center and in-room dining. Wireless Internet access is available throughout the hotel.

general_description: The Huntley Santa Monica Beach offers contemporary style and amenities in a handsome historic building, and is a perfect blend of city and sea. The sandy shores of Santa Monica Beach and the shops, restaurants, and nightclubs of the Third Street Promenade are 2 blocks away.    The hotel's 24-hour business center offers 3 flat-screen computers with complimentary high-speed Internet access and printing. Faxing and copying (surcharge) are available at the front desk. There is also over 5,000 sq feet of conference and event space. A fitness room is open around the clock.   A lobby-level gift shop includes a coffee, pastry, and sandwich counter. 24-hour room service is available.

general_description: The Radisson at USC, Los Angeles is directly across the street from the University of Southern California. Downtown Los Angeles is 1.5 miles away and the Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) is 15 miles away. The hotel features onsite dining options including the sports-themed McKay's Restaurant, the New York-style Rosso's Pizzeria, and McKay's Cocktail Lounge, as well limited-hour room service. A full-service fitness, meeting space, and a business center are also on site. An outdoor pool and spa tub are also on site. Guests can enjoy free WiFi throughout the hotel. This property is pet-friendly, and additional surcharges apply.

dining: Between the newly renovated hotel restaurants, a cocktail lounge, and room service, guests are sure to find the food they crave without ever leaving the hotel. To provide for the healthy lifestyles of our guests, a light and healthy dishes are offered as well. McKay's Cocktail Lounge - Catch up with friends over cocktails or watch the game at this stylish and relaxed lounge. Open Monday-Saturday 11 AM - 11 PM, and on Sunday 11 AM - 7 PM. McKay's Restaurant - Whether stopping in to enjoy the lively sports atmosphere, or looking for a great bite to eat morning or night, McKay's provides the perfect selection of LA's finest foods. Meals served Monday-Saturday include breakfast from 6:30 AM -10 AM, lunch from 11 AM - 3 PM, and dinner from 5 PM - 10 PM. Sunday breakfast is also served from 8 AM - 11 AM. Rosso's Pizzeria - Offering New York-style thin crust pizza and pasta dishes and beer on tap, guests can watch the game on 5 flat screen TVs or play a game on the 20-foot shuffle board. Open Monday-Saturday from 11 AM - 10 PM. Room Service at the Radisson at USC, Los Angeles is available from 6:30 AM to 11 PM, so guests can enjoy the best of McKay's Restaurant in the privacy of their own guestroom.

hotel_name: HYATT house Los Angeles LAX/El Segundo
general_description: Located at the heart of the Rosecrans Corridor business center, HYATT house Los Angeles LAX/El Segundo is 16 miles from downtown Los Angeles and 30 minutes from Anaheim. Marina Del Rey is six miles west.The aparthotel offers a complimentary buffet breakfast with hot and cold items. Complimentary beer, wine, sodas, and appetizers are served Monday-Thursday during a social hour. The splash pool is located in the central courtyard adjacent to the sport court and a patio area with two barbeque grills and picnic tables. Additional recreation options include basketball and volleyball courts, as well as a fitness room.The aparthotel provides complimentary wireless Internet access, laundry facilities, valet laundry services, a convenience store, grocery shopping service, and a concierge. A "concierge" kiosk provides local information and driving directions via a computer touch-screen. Pet Policy: For guests staying 1-6 nights, a $75 non-refundable pet fee will be administered.  Guests staying 7-30 nights, a $75 non-refundable pet fee plus an additional $100 cleaning fee will be administered. Guests staying 30 plus nights, please contact the hotel using the contact details in the booking confirmation. The fee(s) will be inclusive of taxes. A maximum of 2 dogs per room are permitted. Only dogs weighing 50 lbs and under are permitted; two dogs may be allowed in a guestroom provided the combined weight of both dogs does not exceed 75 pounds; the pet fee encompasses this and pets exceeding this are at the hotel's discretion. All pets must be housebroken. Service animals are exempt from fees.

general_description: Best Western Airpark Hotel LAX Airport offers an airport shuttle that runs 24 hours a day. Guests can request this service by using the courtesy phone in the baggage claim area of the airport. A complimentary breakfast is served each morning.

hotel_name: Ramada Plaza West Hollywood Hotel and Suites
general_description: Located two blocks from the famed Sunset Strip, the Ramada Plaza Hotel & Suites - West Hollywood is six blocks from the shops of Beverly Center and 3 miles (4.8 kilometers) from Hollywood.Offering indoor and outdoor dining, the casual Kitchen 24 serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner 24 hours a day. There is a Cousins Maine Lobster, winners of Shark Tank opened first restaurant in West Hollywood. Enterprise Rent-a-Car onsite as well. The hotel also has its very own Starbucks.Complimentary wireless Internet access is available throughout the hotel, and a business center provides two computers with high-speed Internet access for a fee.A small outdoor heated splash pool is located in a quiet, second-floor courtyard. In addition to an on-site fitness room, guests receive discounted access to a health club across the street.Parking in a secure, underground garage is available for a daily fee. Truck and bus parking is also available nearby for a fee. Several laundry facilities are available at Ramada Plaza Hotel & Suites - West Hollywood.

dining: Kitchen 24 - The onsite restaurant combines the relaxed comfort of a traditional diner with a vibrant and modern energy. The restaurant is open 24 hours a day for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Burgerim serves lunch and dinner and is the first burger joint in the Los Angeles area serving only 100% certified organic food. Everything from the buns, the sauce, vegetables, meat, ketchup, mustard, fries and salad dressing is organic. The restaurant is as eco-friendly as possible, only using packaging that is made from renewable resources that are recyclable, compostable and/or biodegradable. The hotel has its very own Starbucks, as well as a bar/lounge.
nearby: A quiet interior courtyard houses a small outdoor, heated splash pool. A fitness room has a treadmill, stationary bike, and strength-training equipment. Guests also receive discounted access to a health club across the street, providing fitness classes, a spa tub, and sauna. Six blocks from the hotel, West Hollywood Park has an outdoor pool, basketball and tennis courts, a playground, and a library. The recreational activities listed below are available either on site or near the hotel; fees may apply.

general_description: Conveniently situated on Third Street, between Beverly Hills and West Hollywood, The Orlando is a central shopping and dining destination.  Just a mile from the shops and restaurants of the Grove and three miles from Runyon Canyon among many other venues, The Orlando offers something for every interest.  The welcoming lobby lounge offers every modern convenience for guests and visitors.  Sofas, chairs, a 42-inch HDTV, a lending library, newspapers, and complimentary WiFi all provide a relaxing and comfortable atmosphere to guests. Guests can rent iPods loaded with music at the front desk to play in mp3 docking stations in guest rooms. A 24-hour business center is available onsite.  Several guest rooms access the inviting outdoor pool and lounge area.  A state-of-the-art 24-hour fitness center is on site including relaxing dry and wet saunas.  The Orlando is a smoke-free property. Valet parking is offered (surcharge).

general_description: Opened in 2011, Mr. C Beverly Hills represents a fresh new signature hotel concept from Venice, Italy's Cipriani family. A blend of European glamour and modern comforts, Mr. C provides todays traveler with an elegant and effortless experience--all presented with discreet, personalized service.The lobby sets the tone with travertine flooring, rosewood finishes, and hand-blown Venetian glass chandeliers. The 4,500-square-foot outdoor pool is framed by a teakwood deck with daybeds, private cabanas, and a poolside bar. Manicured gardens surround the pool area.At the Mr. C Restaurant, the menu showcases Cipriani classics, along with grilled specialties and pizzas. Outdoor seating is provided, weather permitting. The lobby lounge features a glass pool table. Room service, as well as personalized concierge service, is available 24 hours a day.Mr. C Beverly Hills' 24-hour fitness center is outfitted with state-of-the-art Technogym equipment. Other highlights include complimentary transportation within a three-mile radius, PressReader service, and complimentary use of the hotel's iPads and MacBook laptops. Wireless Internet access is available in public areas (surcharge). This property charges a resort fee which include items such as a welcome Bellini upon arrival, car service within 3 miles from 10am-10pm (based on availability), 15% off lunch and dinner at the Mr. C Restaurant (excludes alcohol, tax and gratuity; may not be available during special events), and 10% off spa services (excludes tax and gratuity).

hotel_name: SLS Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Beverly Hills
general_description: This Beverly Hills hotel features a rooftop deck with a pool, and a business center offering printers, fax machines, and laptop computers. The guest lobby is private. Guests receive preferential access and reservations at restaurants, lounges, and nightclubs owned by SBE Entertainment. The Bazaar by José Andrés, an open café area, includes 3 dining options: SAAM, The Bazaar, and Tres. Tres restaurant offers intimate all-day dining & cocktail creations by Chef José Andrés. Altitude is on the rooftop pool deck. The Bazaar by José Andrés serves brunch from late morning until mid-afternoon Saturdays and Sundays. Room service is available 24 hours a day.Other amenities at this 5-star hotel include a 24-hour fitness facility, WiFi, concierge services, tours/ticketing assistance, and a complimentary area shuttle.The full-service, 5,000-square-foot Ciel Spa at SLS features a dynamic menu of traditional, innovative, and signature salon and spa treatments. Signature treatments include the Spun Glass Facial, which uses Freeze 24/7 product to erase fine lines and wrinkles. All massages begin with a relaxing foot bath ritual while customized aromatherapy essential oils are blended and added to the guest's massage oil. In-room and poolside cabana massages can be arranged.

general_description: The stylish Chamberlain West Hollywood offers a desirable West Hollywood location just 2 blocks from the Sunset Strip and 1 mile from Beverly Hills.The hotel's rooftop pool and white cabanas provide panoramic city views. A 24-hour fitness facility and 24-hour business center are provided. Two larger cabanas with cushioned lounge chairs and tables can be reserved. Guests can also reserve 484 square feet of meeting/conference space, as well as audio visual equipment. Event catering and wedding services are also available. Room service is available during limited hours. Free high-speed wired and wireless Internet access are available throughout the hotel. Secure parking, valet parking, and visitor parking are available (surcharges). Shuttles are available to and from the airport (surcharge), to nearby shopping (complimentary), to theme park (surcharge), and to areas within 3 miles (complimentary). Other amenities include laundry facilities, luggage storage, tour/ticket assistance, and on-site medical assistance.The Chamberlain West Hollywood is a smoke-free property. Fines apply for smoke-free violations.

general_description: Adjacent to Van Nuys Airport, this aviation themed hotel features a model Pan American airplane suspended in the lobby and offers a prime location to watch private planes arrive and depart. Centrally located in the San Fernando Valley, conduct your business with ease in Universal City, Sherman Oaks, Burbank and Santa Monica. When it is time to explore the area, visit Woodley Park/Lake Balboa, an 80-acre outdoor recreational area which offers an 18-hole golf course, tennis courts, bike rental, water sports, picnic space, Japanese Garden, sports center and cricket field.Landings Restaurant is open for breakfast and lunch. Grab a quick bite at the casual Clipper Cafe, and enjoy the Happy Hour at the Clipper Club Lounge or settle in for a quiet evening and order in room dining.Outdoor seating and picnic areas are located throughout the hotel's landscaped grounds. The 24-hour fitness center offers free weights and cardiovascular and strength-training equipment.For your meeting and event needs, take advantage of the 22,000 square feet (2043 square meters) of flexible indoor and outdoor space. Choose one of the 18 rooms that best suits your needs, including ballrooms, boardrooms, or the 6,800 square foot (631 square meter) outdoor garden. A 24-hour business center provides printing, faxing, copying, and a computer with high-speed Internet access (fees apply). Complimentary wireless Internet access is available throughout the hotel.This hotel has designated smoking areas (fines apply for smoking outside these areas). Secure self parking accommodating buses, oversized vehicles, trailers, RVs and trucks is available for a surcharge. A complimentary shuttle service is provided to and from LAX/Van Nuys FlyAway terminal, Orange line metro stop and Amtrak station. On-site amenities also include an ATM service.
